missing_evidence: No CCTV footage or surveillance images found. Consider collecting CCTV from nearby locations.
Check for forensic reports (fingerprints, DNA analysis, blood spatter analysis).
No FIR (First Information Report) found. Ensure FIR is included in case files.
Obtain statements from neighbors and nearby residents.
No medical reports found. If injuries occurred, obtain medical examination reports.
Collect phone records and call logs if applicable.
Verify alibis and cross-check with CCTV timestamps.
No witness statements found. Consider obtaining statements from witnesses and bystanders.

extracted_content.extracted_text:
POLICE INVESTIGATION MEMO
Case Number: CR-2024-001234
Date: November 16, 2024
Time: 10:00 AM
Inves(cid:415)ga(cid:415)ng Officer: Inspector Mohan Das
Badge Number: PS-4567
Inves(cid:415)ga(cid:415)on Summary:
Following the FIR registered on November 15, 2024, at 9:05 PM, I conducted a thorough inves(cid:415)ga(cid:415)on
of the incident at ABC Supermarket, MG Road.
Key Findings:
1. CCTV Footage Analysis:
- CCTV Camera 01 shows suspect entering shop at 8:12:34 PM
- Suspect was wearing black shirt at (cid:415)me of entry
- Alterca(cid:415)on visible in CCTV footage at 8:25:15 PM
- Suspect exits shop at 8:30:22 PM wearing white shirt
- Time discrepancy noted: Witness statement men(cid:415)ons 8:15 PM for argument, but CCTV shows
8:25 PM
2. Witness Statements:
- Vikas Sharma: Confirmed seeing suspect in black shirt enter at 8:12 PM, heard argument around
8:15 PM, saw suspect exit at 8:30 PM in white shirt
- Anil Singh (Store Employee): Confirmed alterca(cid:415)on occurred, es(cid:415)mated (cid:415)me 8:20-8:30 PM
3. Medical Evidence:
- Vic(cid:415)m Rajesh Kumar sustained serious injuries
- Medical report indicates deep lacera(cid:415)on and compound fracture
- Injury (cid:415)me es(cid:415)mated between 8:30 PM and 9:00 PM
- Note: Witness described injury as "minor cut" but medical report shows "deep lacera(cid:415)on and
fracture"
4. Inconsistencies Iden(cid:415)fied:
- Time discrepancy: Witness says argument at 8:15 PM, CCTV shows 8:25 PM
- Clothing change: Suspect entered in black shirt, exited in white shirt (unexplained)
- Injury severity: Witness described "minor injury" but medical report shows serious injuries
5. Evidence Collected:
- CCTV footage from ABC Supermarket
- CCTV footage from neighboring shops (requested)
- Medical examina(cid:415)on report
- Witness statements
- Crime scene photographs
Recommenda(cid:415)ons:
- Obtain CCTV footage from all nearby shops for (cid:415)me period 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM
- Conduct forensic examina(cid:415)on of crime scene
- Interview addi(cid:415)onal witnesses from neighboring establishments
- Verify suspect's alibi for (cid:415)me period 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM
Next Steps:
- Awai(cid:415)ng forensic report
- Pending CCTV footage from 3 neighboring shops
- Suspect iden(cid:415)fica(cid:415)on in progress
Officer Signature: Inspector Mohan Das
Date: November 16, 2024
